note: Information as of September 15, 2022. 'Allegedly' means one country charged another, but the claims were not confirmed by the country itself or impartial observers.
title: Number of countries by their current activity on biological weapons
subtitle: Biological weapons are organisms or toxins used to cause death or harm through their poisonous properties.
sourceDesc: OWID based on ACA (2022), NTI (2022), and CNS (2008).
